ygData.subject: Re: Banded Difficulty - Second Time Asking
ygData.msgSnippet: Remember there is a randomness flag. I have not made too many of any one item before my skill changes and things get easier. Its funny, I was sooo scared to
ygData.messageBody:
Remember there is a randomness flag.

I have not made too many of any one item before my skill changes and
things get easier.

Its funny, I was sooo scared to make Cloaks since someone posted that
skill 145 was needes. BAH, they are well over 50% success, I just
can't seem to make a regular steady profit from Mantles and for some
reason Masks - but then with AC 4 who wants a mask.

--- John Robertson <johnr@...> wrote:
> From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
>
>
> Brendan Daly wrote:
>
> > From: Brendan Daly <samidaly@...>
> >
> > Gorget and bracer the easiest
> > Belt
> > Sleeves
> > Boots
> > Helm
> > Mask
> > Cloak
> > Mail
> > Leggings
> > Mantle
> >
> > or pretty close to this, my experience at 125
> skill
>
> Man, this smithing stuff is confusing :)
>
> At level 100, I can make everything easily enough...
> but legs, cloaks and
> (strangely enough) belts give me big problems still.
>
> Time for more skewers.
>
> Jyzan
>
